DataElement.preferredName: Liver Iron Concentration Assessment Performed Unit of Measure
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The unit of measure that represents a determinate amount or quantity of the liver iron concentration.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A measurement of the concentration of iron in the liver as an estimate of body iron load._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A measurement of the concentration of iron in the liver as an estimate of body iron load.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: A measurement of the concentration of iron in the liver as an estimate of body iron load.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Liver Iron Concentration Unit of Measure
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A measurement of the concentration of iron in the liver as an estimate of body iron load._A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified, used as a standard measurement of like kinds.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Gram Iron per kilogram liver (Dry Weight)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Gram Iron per kilogram liver (Dry Weight)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A measurement of iron in the liver expressed as a ratio of grams of iron to kilograms of dry weight of the liver sample.

Concepts.longName: Gram Iron per kilogram liver (Dry Weight)
Concepts.definition: A measurement of iron in the liver expressed as a ratio of grams of iron to kilograms of dry weight of the liver sample.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Milligram Iron per Gram Liver (Dry Weight)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Milligram Iron per Gram Liver (Dry Weight)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A measurement of iron in the liver expressed as a ratio to the dry weight of the liver sample.

Concepts.longName: Milligram Iron per Gram Liver (Dry Weight)
Concepts.definition: A measurement of iron in the liver expressed as a ratio of milligrams of iron to grams of dry weight of the liver sample.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Micromole Iron per Gram Liver (Dry Weight)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Micromole Iron per Gram Liver (Dry Weight)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A measurement of iron in the liver expressed as a ratio of grams of iron to kilograms of dry weight of the liver sample.

Concepts.longName: Micromole Iron per Gram Liver (Dry Weight)
Concepts.definition: A measurement of iron in the liver expressed as a ratio of micromoles of iron to grams of dry weight of the liver sample.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the units of measure for assessment results and dosing.
